name: Vivo X50, 128 GB, 8 GB RAM, Glaze Black, Smartphone
description:
Sleek Design
Crafted for Elegance

X50 features a delightful 2.5D Ultra O screen, with a minimal 3.96mm camera punch hole. It is lighter, slimmer and more ergonomic than you ever expected. With COP technology, X50 achieves a bottom bezel of just 2.8mm!
Glaze Black is just 7.55mm sleek and weighs 173g, whereas Frost Blue is even slimmer at 7.49mm, weighing only 171.5g.


* This Vivo X50 Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Soothing Colors
Transcend the Ordinary

X50 is a masterpiece of visionary technology crafted with sleek textures and dreamy colors. It is designed to bring serenity into busy lives, lifting you above the conventional.


* This Vivo X50 Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.



* This Vivo X50 Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Superb Night Camera
A Million Shades of Night

The OIS stabilization system enhances the stability and clarity of night scene photos by extending exposure time through the large F1.6 aperture, and leveraging the AI Noise Cancellation algorithm at the RAW level. The reduced frames taken together with reduced imaging time make every night shot stunningly sharp and crystal clear. The custom IMX598 sensor amplifies the light sensitivity, making delightful night photography an enthusiastic desire for you!

Extreme Night Vision
See in Almost No Light

For those almost no light moments, Extreme Night Vision kicks in automatically when maximal darkness is detected. Together with the AI Noise Cancellation algorithm, it penetrates the darkest night and captures even the finer details.


* This Vivo X50 Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Pro sports mode
Capture Moving Subjects like a Pro

X50's combination of OIS stabilization and the custom IMX598 sensor helps you take stunning motion shots due to perfectly adjusted exposure times. The clarity is further enhanced with the Motion Deblur algorithm to reduce any residual blur and give you pose-perfect captures.


* This Vivo X50 Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Motion AF Tracking
Never Lose the Focus

Our industry-leading intelligent continuous AF tracking algorithm delivers stunning clarity, letting you cherish your spotlight moments. It tracks faces when eyes cannot be detected, and when faces too cannot be detected, it tracks the body to maintain focus. By default, it tracks the subject taking up the biggest proportion of the frame, delivering superior results, even for inanimate objects.

20x Digital Zoom

Get Closer to What you See

Now extend your view with the 2x Optical Zoom and 20X Digital Zoom and bring distant details closer to you. Preserve the finer aspects of the breathtaking sight you want to keep in your memories forever.


* This Vivo X50 Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


50 mm
Professional Portrait Lens
Capture the Beautiful You

With a professional 50mm F2.0 portrait lens, X50 captures wondrous, authentic portraits. vivo’s advanced algorithm further separates subjects from backgrounds, thus supplementing the hardware capabilities, giving you an even more stunning version of yourself.


* This Vivo X50 Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Super Wide-Angle Camera
Conquer Wider Perspective

Capture grander landscapes and bring all the love together in your large group shots. X50’s 8MP Super Wide-Angle camera expands your view to a full 120-degrees*.


* This Vivo X50 Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Super Macro Camera
Capture Minute Details

The 5MP Super Macro Camera lets you dive into an untapped world full of miniscule wonders, like the tip of a blade of spring grass, the texture on a captivating ladybug, or even the icing of your birthday cake, from as close at 1.5cm**!

Resolution limited to 2MP at 1.5cm distance


* This Vivo X50 Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Cinematic Master
Direct Your Own Film

Film anything you like with X50 as a pro vlog editing crew. And with just one click, you can turn your raw footage into a marvellous piece of art.

Smooth Display
Pure Visual Delight

The X50 has a 90Hz display refresh rate which lets you not miss a single frame while watching your favourite video content. The 180Hz screen response rate adds to this elevated experience by giving you a touch response which feels like a breath. Whether it be your favourite games or the latest intriguing series you are watching, X50's display is bound to give you a visual thrill like never before!
Through the customized Sunlight Display algorithm, the brightness of the X50 display ranges between 1.9 nits to 1300 nits which means you have a worry-free viewing under almost all light conditions.
X50's 2.5D Ultra O Screen has a LIV AMOLED Display made of E3 OLED and supports HDR10+ standard, giving you richer colors, higher dynamic range, and deeper details.

 

Powerful Performance
Full Speed Ahead

The Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 730 Mobile Platform boasts both high-end flagship performance and low energy consumption – so you can run multiple apps simultaneously, or play resource-heavy games without any lag.
The vivo Energy Guardian is your most efficient tool to counter the elevated energy consumption typically associated with high performance displays. It utilizes multiple energy consumption optimization techniques to perfectly balance peak performance with elevated power sustenance.


* This Vivo X50 Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


vivo 33W Flashcharge 2.0
Charge in a Flash

To sustain the superior performance and capabilities X50 brings, a 4200 mAh long lasting battery gives you all the power needed for those high intensity days. The 33W FlashCharge 2.0 helps you regain battery charge almost instantly so that your quest to achieve your dreams carries on without a glitch.


* This Vivo X50 Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
summary:
• 16.67 cm (6.56 inch) 2376 x 1080 FHD+ AMOLED Display
  • 48MP + 13MP + 8MP + 5MP Primary Camera
  • 32 MP Selfie Camera, Rear Flash
  • Snapdragon 730 Processor, 4200 mAh Battery
  • Funtouch OS 10.5 Operating System, Vivo 33W FlashCharge

description:
Wonderful in all aspects108MP/64MP AI triple camera

144Hz AdaptiveSync display with Truecolor

Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 865 with 5G

5000 mAh (typ) battery with 33W fast charging

108MP ultra-clear flagship camera

Cool shots with exquisite details near and far

64MP high resolution camera

Big pictures in big detail

Create movie-quality content

7680 × 4320 ultra high resolution | Take 33MP photos straight from 8K video

Enjoy the unprecedented smoothness

Mi 10T Pro/Mi10T features Xiaomi's highest refresh rate screen so far! 144Hz ultra-high refresh rate can show up to 144 frames per second. The seamless screen transitions will reduce eye discomfort and dizziness especially when playing games or quickly scrolling through content.

Significantly improves gaming experience

With ultra low latency and less delay, you can act faster and secure the win

A Smart AdaptiveSync Display

Automatically matches each App to the best-suited refresh rate from 30Hz-144Hz to get ultimate smooth experience and optimize power consumption

MEMC Technology*

Improves fluidity of low frame rate content to clearly display quick movements

The algorithm can accurately recognize motion trajectories, and naturally inserts compensation frames in low-frame-rate content such as movies, TV series or sports games, increasing the frame rate up to 60fps, effectively reducing blurriness and flickering.

6.67" FHD+ DotDisplay

Detailed and clear display, real-world vividness

Wide Color Gamut ( Supports DCI-P3 )

Adopting the film industry standard to provide a much wider gamut of colours compared to sRGB, bringing true-to-life visual experience.

TrueColor ( JNCD≈0.39 Delta E≈0.63 )

Adopting industry-leading color management technology, the screen is adjusted frame by frame, which greatly improves the color accuracy.

Powerful processing Faster running

Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 865 with 5G

Leading 5G chipset of 2020
The highly improved CPU, GPU and AI performance provides a fast and exciting 5G experience

8GB LPDDR5

Largest available

256GB UFS 3.1 Flash storage

Largest available

More stable and efficient, 33W wired fast charge

We've combined the innovative MMT parallel charging method (current is delivered from the center of the battery, allowing two parallel routes of simultaneous charging) and Mi Fast Charge technology to achieve stable and efficient charging.

100% charge in only 59 minutes*

Sophisticated Design, Flagship Feel

Black but not too heavy. The glass back with a ceramic-like sheen exudes class

Sophisticated Design, Flagship Feel

Using unique AG technology, the glass back has a frosted matte texture and feels smooth to the hand.

Sophisticated Design, Flagship Feel

Its soft blue and purple gradient design reflects the glow of different colors from different angles, subtly everchanging.

Added Protection

Silver ion antibacterial case + antibacterial screen protector

The case is protected with silver ion technology for long-lasting antibacterial effect, keeping you safe 24 hours a day. After 24 hours of contact, the case can eliminate more than 99% of the bacteria.

  • 360 degree Ambient Light Sensor
  • 33 Watts Wired Fast Charge
  • Multifuctional NFC

  • Dual Super-linear Speakers

name: LG ThinQ G7 Plus Smart Phone 128 GB, 6 GB RAM, Aurora Black
description:
The LG G7 Plus is an outstanding device that comes with 15.49 cm (6.1-inch) QHD display. The screen is 1000 nits bright, so it works amazingly even under direct sunlight. The device is power by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 845 processor, which can easily take on high-end apps and graphic-intensive games such as Fortnite and PUBG:Mobile. The device runs on Android 8 Oreo and uses LG’s custom UI for simpler and sleeker user experience. This phone will also support the latest Android 10 update. The G7 Plus sports 16MP dual-lens camera which clicks outstanding pictures and videos up to 4K resolutions. With its 3,000 mAh battery life, this phone can easily last a day even under heavy usage.

Super Bright Display
Your world just got a whole lot brighter. The G7+ packs additional white pixels into the screen for stunning picture clarity and brightness-while maximizing battery efficiency.

AI CAM
The G7+ provides the creative eye, so you can get your perfect shot. AI CAM analyzes subjects in your frame and provides easy recommendations on how to improve your picture.

Super Bright Camera
Get the best out of every moment with a camera so smart, that it knows when it’s too dark and automatically increases the brightness of each shot.

Tags
Gallery searches are now quick and simple, as all your images are accurately analyzed and sorted into different albums.

Portrait Mode
Take artistic pictures or self-portraits that focus on the subject and blur the background for a stunning effect-applied in real time or after the shot is captured.

Dual 16MP Cameras
Super wide-angle lens allows you to capture more of every scene, including large groups or landscapes. Plus, the G7+ Crystal Clear Lens dramatically improves dynamic range and low-light capabilities.

Boombox Speaker
The G7+ uses its inner space as a resonance chamber to amp up the bass and deliver a premium, loud, and room-filling audio experience.

Super Far Field Voice Recognition
Now all your questions and requests will be heard loud and clear. The G7+ picks up your voice from even farther away and in noisy places like the car, on a boat, or when music is playing.

DTS: X 3D Surround Sound
7.1 channel surround sound delivers cinematic audio on the go and brings a new sense of realism to your listening experience.

Qualcomm Snapdragon 845 Mobile Platform
It is the ultimate intelligent mobile platform armed with the 3rd gen Qualcomm AI Engine, superior battery experience and the lightning fast connectivity.

Google Assistant Key
Click the Google Assistant Key and your Google Assistant is ready to respond, press and hold to skip your introductory ‘Hey Google’, and double-click to access Google Lens.

Durability
Take it anywhere, use it anywhere-the military grade design is water, dust, and worry resistant.

name: Realme X50 Pro 128 GB, 8 GB RAM, Rust Red, Smartphone
description:
Ready for 5G

Leading the 5G era with coverage of the world's mainstream 5G bands. The theoretical download speed peaks at up to 3.45 Gbps, which is 10x higher than 4G. It takes less than 10s to download an HD movie, and live-streaming at 4K ultra-clear resolutions is achieved without any buffering.

360 degree Surround Antenna

Fully Support Wi-Fi 6

X50 Pro 5G features a 360 degree surround antenna design, which is 200% more than 4G phones. It supports Dual SIM Dual Standby, Smart 5G, and can also intelligently switch from 4G to 5G, thus reducing power consumption by 30%.

Qualcomm Snapdragon 865

All-round Futuristic Technology

The 7nm Octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 with A77 performance cores, can reach clock speeds of up to 2.84GHz. It supports Desktop Forward Rendering for extreme realism and the first-ever updatable GPU driver on a mobile. Behold a new generation of flagship mobile platform, with higher performance and more fun in the mobile gaming age.

LPDDR5 & UFS 3.0

With up to 12GB+256GB supported, the new LPDDR5 standard and UFS 3.0+Turbo Write+HPB greatly improves overall performance and reduces power consumption. Now web browsing and gaming can be smooth like never before.

Vapor Cooling System

Five-dimensional Vapor Cooling Pro

The new upgraded five-dimensional Vapor Cooling System enables higher heat dissipation performance. Vapor Chamber dissipates heat from an area of up to 1821 mm , compared with the previous generation of heat pipes increased by 339%, ensuring high performance all the time, even while heavy gaming.

65W SuperDart Charge

X50 Pro 5G uses dual cell design for both safety and speed. These blistering charging speeds are protected by an intelligent five-core chip system that provides real-time monitoring. X50 Pro 5G also supports 18W QC/PD charging and 30W Flash Charge, making it even more versatile.

90Hz Ultra Smooth Display

180Hz Ultra-high Sampling Rate

Compared with the 60Hz display, 90Hz display has 50% higher refresh rate to provide a smoother visual experience. 180Hz ultra-high sampling rate improves the gaming speed and touch response.

16.4cm (6.44 inch) Super AMOLED Fullscreen

X50 Pro 5G comes with the 20:9 screen ratio and 2400x1080P FHD+ resolution. Moreover, it is equipped with the 16.4cm (6.44 inch) Super AMOLED and E3 luminescent materials to become the universal genius in every aspect.

Ultra Six Cameras

105° Ultra wide-angle lens captures 2.5x larger view than ordinary lens. This is the first smartphone to feature Edge Deformity Correction, and it can recognize faces and automatically optimize the face contours when you capture on the edge of photo.

64MP Quad Camera And 20x Hybrid Zoom

The SAT smooth-zoom technology developed by realme can simulate the zoom feeling of cameras. Multiple lenses are switched and the picture is stabilized, keeping the same exposure and color temperature, to achieve this "seamless zoom".

Ultra NightScape

For the first time, realme has added the Ultra NightScape to help you capture the real night scenes. Even in the 1 Lux low light environment, it can take clear, bright, and high-quality night pictures.

Super Nightscape 3.0

Super Nightscape can capture various night scenes. A picture of night view blockbuster can be taken with the mode of night view with enough light. While in terms of weak light, turn on the tripod mode to get the excellent quality night view picture after the long exposure.

UIS Max Video Stabilization

The new UIS Max adopts wide-angle picture clipping technology to achieve more field of vision and more amazing anti-shake effect. Even if you run and jump, the picture won’t be blurred.
summary:
• 64 MP Quad Camera, Ready For 5G
  • 90 Hz Super AMOLED Fullscreen
  • 65W SuperDart Charge
  • Snapdragon 865 5G Processor
  • Vapor Cooling System
  • Dual Stereo Speakers
  • New Era of Mobile Gaming

name: Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite 512 GB, 8 GB RAM, Prism Blue, Smartphone
description:
Get the best smartphone experience with the Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smartphone, Prism Blue which provides you with amazing features so that you never have to look elsewhere. The 16.95 cm (6.7 inch) Infinity-O Display gives you a breath-taking visual experience on the Full HD+ Super AMOLED Plus screen, while the 4500 mAh battery makes sure you never run out of power during important moments. The elegant 3D Glasstic design with Prism White coloured back turns heads anywhere you carry it. With a built-in proximity sensor, light sensor, and On-Screen Fingerprint scanner you get your work done swifter. The Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smartphone, Prism Blue features a stunning triple 48 MP + 12 MP + 5 MP main camera that lets you capture every detail. Gather more details with the 5 MP macro camera and more scene with 123-degree wide view 12 MP camera. Get all the focus on yourself and your squad with the 32 MP front selfie camera. The 8 GB RAM and the 512 GB ROM makes your smartphone a very viable option for you so that you can multitask without fear of losing out on any data and time.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Pro-grade camera powers for everyone
Start with the 48MP Main Camera for vibrant, high-resolution photos day or night. Switch to the 123° Ultra Wide Camera for breathtaking landscape. Get as close as 4cm to uncover the finest details with the Macro Camera and flip over to take share-worthy selfies with the 32MP Front Camera.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Smoother video without the shake, even in low light
Super Steady OIS allows for a wider correction angle, letting you add gimbal-like stability and UHD quality to your live videos and photos in low-light conditions. For action-packed scenes, switch to Super Steady Mode for a smooth and steady capture.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

 


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone video is for illustration purpose only.


Film only what you want to focus on, blur out the rest
Live Focus Video lets you capture only what you want to focus on while you're recording. Now you can put the attention directly on your subject by blurring out the background with multiple pro-quality effects to choose from.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone video is for illustration purpose only.

 


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone video is for illustration purpose only.


v


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone video is for illustration purpose only.

 


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone video is for illustration purpose only.


Turn up the volume on what you like with Zoom-in Mic
Sometimes it’s the audio that stands out in a scene a funny laugh, a crashing wave, or an important presentation. Galaxy S10 Lite's Zoom-in Mic features 3 microphones that effectively target and enhance the sound in real-time as you zoom in and out.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone video is for illustration purpose only.


Shoot like a pro, edit on the go
You've taken a great video. It's time to add a memorable caption, or combine it with another clip, or even speed it up. However you choose to add your own finishing touch, Galaxy S10 Lite makes it simple and easy with an all-in-one built-in video editing suite.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Go wider a lot wider with the Ultra Wide Camera
The 12MP Ultra Wide Camera was built to capture the world the way your eyes do. With a 123° angle of view, landscape scenes are fully preserved with each epic detail exactly as you saw them.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Vibrant pixels in every shot, day or night
In sunlight or moonlight, every picture taken with Galaxy S10 Lite's high-resolution 48MP Main Camera comes to life in brilliant pixel clarity. It's even equipped with digital zoom capability, letting you get closer without sacrificing picture quality.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Macro Cam leaves no detail behind
Galaxy S10 Lite's 5MP Macro Camera brings you impossibly close to all the beautiful details. At an optimal distance of 4cm, start capturing more detail in every moment from unique individual texture patterns to intricately refined colors.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Welcome to the one-take selfie
For attention-grabbing selfies every time, flip over to Galaxy S10 Lite's 32MP Front Camera. With Live Focus, you can add a gentle bokeh background blur before or after the shot, making sure the focus is always on you.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Accelerate your multi-tasking with a cutting-edge Snapdragon 855 processor
Galaxy S10 Lite combines a speedy processor with spacious storage giving you a smooth and responsive multi-tasking experience. Galaxy S10 Lite features a large 8GB RAM, as well as a 512GB internal storage capacity.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Game Booster delivers a smoother gaming experience
Maximize performance with Game Booster. An intuitive interface lets you easily monitor important settings, so you can game at your best with less distraction. Learning your usage patterns to optimize temperature, battery, and memory, Game Booster takes your gaming to another level.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


4,500mAh battery power to last 2-day
Galaxy S10 Lite’s 4,500mAh All-day Battery isn’t just powerful, it’s intelligent, too. Based on your daily usage pattern, it optimizes power consumption by closing infrequently used apps. Now you can go all day today and tomorrow without worrying about how much battery is left.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Super Fast Charging – 30 min. to last all day
With Super Fast Charging, your Galaxy S10 Lite maximizes every minute of charging time. So even a quick 30-minute charge during breakfast or an afternoon coffee break is all you need to last the rest of the day.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Enjoy a seamlessly connected lifestyle
The Link to Windows app brings the Galaxy S10 Lite experience to your Windows 10 laptop. Now you can send texts, browse photos, get notifications, even use your mobile apps right from your laptop.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Samsung Knox keeps your phone safe with multi-layer protection
Your private data is protected from malware and malicious attacks by leveraging the hardware-backed and multi-layered Knox security platform.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Bixby maximizes the day's possibilities
The intelligent assistant, Bixby, responds to your voice. Simplify your tasks with Quick Commands by assigning a keyword or phrase to a group of actions. ¹Use your camera to translate whole sentences from a foreign language via the upgraded Bixby Vision.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Colors designed to shine every time you look
The Magical Prism colors of Galaxy S10 Lite look stunning every time you look at it. Its elegant 3D Glasstic design comes in Prism Black, Prism White and Prism Blue.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


A truly uninterrupted view of your world
The Galaxy S10 Lite's Infinity-O Display gives you a 16.95cm (6.7") Full HD+ Super AMOLED Plus screen. ¹²³ The edge-to-edge display has a built-in proximity sensor, light sensor, and On-Screen Fingerprint scanner. Now you can see and do more of what you love, without interruption.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Upgrade your viewing experience with brighter and clearer colors
Galaxy S10 Lite makes sure you see amazingly rich color and contrast precisely the way it was captured with HDR10+. Whether you’re out in the sun or inside, Galaxy S10 Lite delivers a true-to-life cinematic experience.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Turn up the volume on what you like with Zoom-in Mic
Sometimes it’s the audio that stands out in a scene a funny laugh, a crashing wave, or an important presentation. Galaxy S10 Lite's Zoom-in Mic features 3 microphones that effectively target and enhance the sound in real-time as you zoom in and out.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone video is for illustration purpose only.


Shoot like a pro, edit on the go
You've taken a great video. It's time to add a memorable caption, or combine it with another clip, or even speed it up. However you choose to add your own finishing touch, Galaxy S10 Lite makes it simple and easy with an all-in-one built-in video editing suite.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Go wider a lot wider with the Ultra Wide Camera
The 12MP Ultra Wide Camera was built to capture the world the way your eyes do. With a 123° angle of view, landscape scenes are fully preserved with each epic detail exactly as you saw them.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Vibrant pixels in every shot, day or night
In sunlight or moonlight, every picture taken with Galaxy S10 Lite's high-resolution 48MP Main Camera comes to life in brilliant pixel clarity. It's even equipped with digital zoom capability, letting you get closer without sacrificing picture quality.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Macro Cam leaves no detail behind
Galaxy S10 Lite's 5MP Macro Camera brings you impossibly close to all the beautiful details. At an optimal distance of 4cm, start capturing more detail in every moment from unique individual texture patterns to intricately refined colors.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Welcome to the one-take selfie
For attention-grabbing selfies every time, flip over to Galaxy S10 Lite's 32MP Front Camera. With Live Focus, you can add a gentle bokeh background blur before or after the shot, making sure the focus is always on you.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Accelerate your multi-tasking with a cutting-edge Snapdragon 855 processor
Galaxy S10 Lite combines a speedy processor with spacious storage giving you a smooth and responsive multi-tasking experience. Galaxy S10 Lite features a large 8GB RAM, as well as a 512GB internal storage capacity.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Game Booster delivers a smoother gaming experience
Maximize performance with Game Booster. An intuitive interface lets you easily monitor important settings, so you can game at your best with less distraction. Learning your usage patterns to optimize temperature, battery, and memory, Game Booster takes your gaming to another level.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


4,500mAh battery power to last 2-day
Galaxy S10 Lite’s 4,500mAh All-day Battery isn’t just powerful, it’s intelligent, too. Based on your daily usage pattern, it optimizes power consumption by closing infrequently used apps. Now you can go all day today and tomorrow without worrying about how much battery is left.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Super Fast Charging – 30 min. to last all day
With Super Fast Charging, your Galaxy S10 Lite maximizes every minute of charging time. So even a quick 30-minute charge during breakfast or an afternoon coffee break is all you need to last the rest of the day.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Enjoy a seamlessly connected lifestyle
The Link to Windows app brings the Galaxy S10 Lite experience to your Windows 10 laptop. Now you can send texts, browse photos, get notifications, even use your mobile apps right from your laptop.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Samsung Knox keeps your phone safe with multi-layer protection
Your private data is protected from malware and malicious attacks by leveraging the hardware-backed and multi-layered Knox security platform.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Bixby maximizes the day's possibilities
The intelligent assistant, Bixby, responds to your voice. Simplify your tasks with Quick Commands by assigning a keyword or phrase to a group of actions. ¹Use your camera to translate whole sentences from a foreign language via the upgraded Bixby Vision.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Colors designed to shine every time you look
The Magical Prism colors of Galaxy S10 Lite look stunning every time you look at it. Its elegant 3D Glasstic design comes in Prism Black, Prism White and Prism Blue.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


A truly uninterrupted view of your world
The Galaxy S10 Lite's Infinity-O Display gives you a 16.95cm (6.7") Full HD+ Super AMOLED Plus screen. ¹²³ The edge-to-edge display has a built-in proximity sensor, light sensor, and On-Screen Fingerprint scanner. Now you can see and do more of what you love, without interruption.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


Upgrade your viewing experience with brighter and clearer colors
Galaxy S10 Lite makes sure you see amazingly rich color and contrast precisely the way it was captured with HDR10+. Whether you’re out in the sun or inside, Galaxy S10 Lite delivers a true-to-life cinematic experience.


* This Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite Smart Phone image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
